definition: branch, esp. grass root branches of a political party
to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: We elected him secretary of the Party branch.
sentences.chinese: 我們選舉他爲黨支部書記。

sentences.english: Neil, the new chairman of the Bury St. Edmunds branch of the National Front, called me at home from a pay phone in a pub.
sentences.chinese: 英國民族陣線黨伯裏聖埃德蒙茲支部的新主席叫尼爾。

sentences.english: He is just a flunky of the Party secretary.
sentences.chinese: 他不過是黨支部書記的跟屁蟲。

sentences.english: Zhou Lan was elected not only monitor, but also League branch secretary.
sentences.chinese: 周蘭不僅當選班長，還當選團支部書記。

sentences.english: The matter will be taken up at the next Party branch meeting.
sentences.chinese: 下一次黨支部會議將着手處理此事。

sentences.english: There are 578 branches, including 210 branches in rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 有黨支部578個，其中農村黨支部210個。

sentences.english: There are 578 branches, including 210 branches in rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 有黨支部578個，其中農村黨支部210個。

sentences.english: Yes. I was the class commissary in charge of studies.
sentences.chinese: 我是班上的學習委員，又兼任班上的團支部書記。

sentences.english: He is secretary of our branch.
To develop the nucleus of Party branch.
I'm starting a branch for an all-girl-tree-climber club.
sentences.chinese: 我在爲女子爬樹者俱樂部建一個支部。

sentences.english: Seventh, the Party branch should report regularly to Party headquarters at a higher level and accept its instructions.
sentences.chinese: 第七，支部定期向上級黨部做報告，並接受其指示。

sentences.english: He was elected not only monitor but also League branch secretary .
sentences.chinese: 他不僅當選爲班長，還當選爲團支部書記。

sentences.english: Linwei impulse to find branch secretary theory.
sentences.chinese: 林薇衝動地去找支部書記理論。

sentences.english: The Three - meeting, One - class system is a basic system for reinforcing the construction of the Party branch.
sentences.chinese: “三會一課”制度是加強黨支部建設的基本制度。

sentences.english: Regular branch meetings and plant visits.
sentences.chinese: 黨支部定期會議和工廠參觀。

definition: party affairs/work within the Communist party
youth corps/youth wing of a political party
